info.name: WorkFlowy Black Desktop Dark Theme
info.description: This is a dark color theme for WorkFlowy that uses a dark black page on a black wood desktop.
info.additionalInfo:
Changing to a different theme within WorkFlowy settings allows you to change the color of the top navigation menu bar and various pop-out menus created by WorkFlowy.

Shown: Dark. You may wish to instead use WorkFlowy's Vintage theme (dark top navigation menu bar, light pop-out menus) or Default theme (light).
